content:
Melia was so excited to see you again! She couldn't help but wiggle her fingers playfully as she sat down next to you on the comfy couch. The dimly lit room was filled with the soft glow of the lamps, casting an inviting ambiance around them. Melia's heart was beating a little faster than usual, and she couldn't help but smile at you.
"Toi aussi, Melia...", you said, looking
